nodes.text: The Nyemari Imperial Military Installation was an Imperial Military base on the planet Nyemari. In 1 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's operatives known as the Heroes of Yavin infiltrated the Nyemari Royal Palace to steal the Duchess' access codes to the Nyemari Imperial facility. Their attempt succeeded, but the Rebels were forced to flee the palace after tripping the silent alarm.
The Nyemari Imperial Military Installation was referenced as the target of the Rebel's raid in the beginning of Alex Wheeler's 2010 book Rebel Force: Uprising.
